sentences.en: A huge effort was made to exterminate the rats.
sentences.cn: 灭鼠花了大力气。

sentences.en: A united effort is always more effective than an isolated complaint.
sentences.cn: 联合行动总是比单个人抱怨更有效。

sentences.en: Changes were made in operating methods in an effort to increase profitability.
sentences.cn: 为了提高利润，经营方式上发生了改变。

sentences.en: Church leaders are prepared to meet the terrorists in an effort to (= in order to try to ) find peace.
sentences.cn: 为寻求和平，教会领袖准备与恐怖分子会面。

sentences.en: Current employment laws will be changed to reward effort and punish laziness.
sentences.cn: 现行雇佣法要变，要奖勤罚懒。

sentences.en: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.cn: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

sentences.en: Fortunately, the chore of leaf sweeping is well worth the effort.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，干清扫落叶这个活儿是值得的。

sentences.en: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.en: He was making a visible effort to control himself.
sentences.cn: 他明显是在努力控制自己的情绪。

sentences.en: I'm afraid this essay is a poor effort.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉，这篇文章写得不好。

sentences.en: It is incumbent upon all of us to make an extra effort.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都必须加倍努力。

sentences.en: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.cn: 学说外语要下功夫。

sentences.en: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.cn: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.en: Make a conscious effort to relax your muscles.
sentences.cn: 有意识地放松肌肉。

sentences.en: My kick wasn't half a bad effort for an old man.
sentences.cn: 像我这把年纪的人，老腿确实不听使唤了。

sentences.en: please make an effort to be polite.
sentences.cn: 请尽量礼貌些。

sentences.en: The sheer physical effort had exacted a heavy price.
sentences.cn: 纯粹的体力劳动已经产生了极其不利的影响。

sentences.en: These attacks are seen as an effort to torpedo the talks.
sentences.cn: 人们认为这些袭击是为了故意破坏会谈。

sentences.en: Try to avoid wasteful duplication of effort.
sentences.cn: 尽量避免无用的重复劳动。

sentences.en: We have made a conscious effort to devolve responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我们已有意识地下放职责。

sentences.en: When you came away you made a definite effort to mix.
sentences.cn: 你离开时一定要努力和大家搞好关系。

words.tran_cn: 需要努力的；显示努力的；充满努力的

phrases.tran_cn: 尽力而为，尽最大努力；尽力服务
对某事付出极大的力气
不遗余力；抽出；宽容；节省
团队合作，团队努力的结果

trans.tran_cn: 努力，吃力，有组织的行动，费力的事
trans.tran_en: an attempt to do something, especially when this involves a lot of hard work or determination
